Realtime Processing

Interactive Visual Systems & Live Performance

Real-time video processing and interactive visual systems using TouchDesigner and custom software. These projects explore live visual performance, responsive environments, and the intersection of audio and visual processing in real-time computational systems.

Realtime Components

The essential elements that create responsive real-time visual processing systems.

TouchDesigner

Node-based visual programming for creating complex real-time interactive multimedia content and live performances.

Audio Reactivity

Visual systems that respond dynamically to audio input, creating synchronized audio-visual experiences.

Live Performance

Real-time visual performance systems designed for live events, installations, and interactive experiences.

Interactive Control

MIDI controllers, sensors, and interface systems that allow real-time manipulation of visual parameters.

Realtime Philosophy

"Real-time processing opens up possibilities for truly interactive and responsive visual experiences that blur the line between performer and audience, between input and output."

My real-time visual systems focus on creating immediate, responsive experiences that react to their environment. Whether it's audio-reactive visuals or interactive installations, each project explores how technology can create more engaging and immersive experiences through real-time computation.

The Waveform Generation

Real-time Visual Processing • Toronto, Canada
